title: Betfair23
author: Betfair23
content: verification service for 5 years (until 2027). Once verified, the limits for transactions and possible account blocking are eliminated.Price 10$Once payment is made, a VCC will be sent. It is confirmed and then it will be discarded.Interested comment or send PM.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Betfair23 on February 05, 2023, 02:04:05 AMOnce payment is made, a VCC will be sent. It is confirmed and then it will be discarded.So it's just a vcc for verification? Can not be deducted from the balance? Or is it reloadable VCC services? And what is the source of these cards because most people sell cards that are either stolen or hacked.I see that you sell a lot of accounts with ID cards, so I warn members that dealing with this member may lead to locking your account if you were using your personal data.

comments.author: Betfair23
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on February 05, 2023, 12:04:49 PMQuote from: Betfair23 on February 05, 2023, 02:04:05 AMOnce payment is made, a VCC will be sent. It is confirmed and then it will be discarded.So it's just a vcc for verification? Can not be deducted from the balance? Or is it reloadable VCC services? And what is the source of these cards because most people sell cards that are either stolen or hacked.I see that you sell a lot of accounts with ID cards, so I warn members that dealing with this member may lead to locking your account if you were using your personal data.they are legal virtual cards generated on my bank account they let me generate unlimited virtual cards with they can be used to verify Paypal and many other website there is nothing wonrng selling this kind of service also about your question Paypal deduce a amount from the card to verify it so it's loaded with that amount needed to verify paypal

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Betfair23 on February 05, 2023, 02:04:05 AMverification service for 5 years (until 2027). Once verified, the limits for transactions and possible account blocking are eliminated.Someone correct me if I'm wrong, but adding a card to a PP account does not mean that all limits are removed - because PP blocks the account after a certain limit has been used, and requires verification with personal documents. Verification by adding a card and verification with personal documents are two completely different things.

comments.author: Betfair23
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on February 05, 2023, 03:38:39 PMQuote from: Betfair23 on February 05, 2023, 02:04:05 AMverification service for 5 years (until 2027). Once verified, the limits for transactions and possible account blocking are eliminated.Someone correct me if I'm wrong, but adding a card to a PP account does not mean that all limits are removed - because PP blocks the account after a certain limit has been used, and requires verification with personal documents. Verification by adding a card and verification with personal documents are two completely different things.you are right both verficacione are different from each other

comments.author: maudo
comments.body: do not buy anything from this seller, he scamed me with 400usd

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Under what circumstances can Paypal block your account? And does the blocking risk come back if they card which you verified with has expired in the meantime?Also will they block it if you haven't used your account for some time (we are talking a span of a few years).Quote from: maudo on February 13, 2023, 03:02:09 PMdo not buy anything from this seller, he scamed me with 400usdWhat were you buying form him that costed $400?

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: NotATether on February 14, 2023, 08:26:49 AMWhat were you buying form him that costed $400?Based on this topic, the reason is to btc to usdt exchange. I do not know why this user chose him among the thousands of ways to convert Bitcoin to USDT safely, but there may be another reason.He did not give us more details, but it is better to avoid dealing with the user until we are sure that he is a scammer.Quote from: maudo on February 13, 2023, 01:46:22 PMwe did btc to usdt exchange with this user https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3532285same second btc transaction was confirmed he is gone online and not responding to telegram. Soon i will be uploading whole chat and tx id.400USD is huge money for me and to my family. Thanks for reading and be warned
